label: SynonymTokenFilter
description: Matches single or multi-word synonyms in a token stream. Implemented using Apache Lucene.

fields.label: Expand
fields.tooltip: A value indicating whether all words in the list of synonyms (if => notation is not used) will map to one another. Default is true.

fields.label: Ignore Case
fields.tooltip: A value indicating whether to case-fold input for matching. Default is false.

fields.label: Synonyms
fields.tooltip: A list of synonyms in one of two formats: (1) 'incredible, unbelievable, fabulous => amazing' or (2) 'incredible, unbelievable, fabulous, amazing'.
